title: Bullion-n-BTC
author: Bullion-n-BTC
created_time: April 16, 2023, 03:13:01 AMLast edit: April 21, 2023, 10:10:57 PM by Bullion-n-BTC
content: ***UPDATE ON SHIPPING***Hey guys just wanted to send an update and say packages will start shipping out Monday morning. To those that wanted theirs sent to minerjones I’ll be sending those Monday as well. Once your package is shipped I’ll contact with shipping / tracking info! Thanks again!***SOLD OUT!!!!  / everybody who claimed one got one! Thank you guys for my first “sold out” piece!******I will notify everybody as coins are shipped from me or to MJ! Thank you again for all your support on my first sold out piece! You guys rock!***LuckyFool Physical Bitcoin Series 2 -30 each + 10 shipping to lower 48 / 14 shipping everywhere else-Each coin comes funded with .0001 BTC-Each coin comes with laminated Public Key QR code-Coins have serial # and “LuckyFool Bullion & BTC” laser etched on rim-Made of Nickel with a Proof like finish-Each piece comes in airtite capsule with bumper-Mintage of 50 -40 Sold / 10 available-Random Numbers will be assigned to buyers-Please send shipping info and txid once payment is sentBTC payment address:3GZUGfxEBMk9aLH1CRuWLd3aKXLmuVvsAT***Confirmation will be sent upon txid / tracking will be sent via privnote******I wanted to create a low cost, funded piece available to everybody. This is the second version of the coin from my original release and is far better crafter than the first. The holos adhere to the coin perfectly while being smooth and flat, the textures and finish are much better and much more clear/crisp. I wanted to make an affordable, funded piece to help build and establish trust on the forum. Thanks guys hope you enjoy!

comments.body: CongratsWill take 2 of same number as last series

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Very shiny brass, me gusto. Put me down for 2 if still available. 40 sodld already - were they offered in discord first?Please send to MJ, will pm with txid later on.
